about_the_game:
This is an enjoyable casual racing game. It combines the best aspects of karting games like Mario Kart and Crash Team Racing. Not only does it offer superior controls, but it also provides a wealthier gameplay experience and more entertaining mechanics.


This is a physics-based kart racing game that brings a highly comfortable drifting sensation and an exhilarating sense of speed. Gaining nitro for acceleration through drifting is an advanced technique that maximizes the kart and track's advantages. Continuously refine your drifting and acceleration skills, adjust cornering strategies, and aim for the best track results!


There are many adorable characters to choose from, each with two unique combat skills. In the Power-up Mode, characters can use combat skills or acquire random items, and defeating other opponents is also a way to win!


Each track has its own unique route characteristics. Different tracks have various traps that players need to avoid, and there are also many hidden shortcuts for players to explore. Changing racing strategies based on track route characteristics and special mechanisms is an important way to elevate racing skills.


There are skill advancement training designed specifically for novice players. There are trophy competitions in Nitro Boost Mode. There are trophy competitions featuring character battles and power-up gameplay. There are time trials to pursue faster record updates. There are challenge races with specific conditions.


Supports local 2-player, 3-player, 4-player split-screen gameplay. In local multiplayer split-screen mode, the game's frame rate hardly decreases! Utilize Steam's Remote Play Together feature to directly invite friends from your friend list to play together!
